members.docComment:
/**
 * Base class for a concrete EntityCollectionService<T>. Can be instantiated. Cannot be injected. Use EntityCollectionServiceFactory to create.
 *
 * @param EntityCollectionServiceElements - The ingredients for this service as a source of supporting services for creating an EntityCollectionService<T> instance.
 */

excerptTokens.text: export declare class EntityCollectionServiceBase<T, S$ extends

members.name: EntityCollectionServiceBase

docs.summary: Constructs a new instance of the `EntityCollectionServiceBase` class

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to save a new entity to remote storage.
 *
 * @param entity - entity to add, which may omit its key if pessimistic and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.
 *
 * @param options - options that influence save and merge behavior
 *
 * @returns Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.
 */
members.name: add

docs.summary: Dispatch action to save a new entity to remote storage.
docs.returns: Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

params.name: entity
params.description: entity to add, which may omit its key if pessimistic and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.

params.name: options
params.description: options that influence save and merge behavior

members.docComment:
/**
 * Replace all entities in the cached collection. Does not save to remote storage.
 *
 * @param entities - to add directly to cache.
 *
 * @param options - options such as mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: addAllToCache

docs.summary: Replace all entities in the cached collection. Does not save to remote storage.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Add multiple new entities directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Entities with primary keys already in cache are ignored.
 *
 * @param entities - to add directly to cache.
 *
 * @param options - options such as mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: addManyToCache

docs.summary: Add multiple new entities directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Entities with primary keys already in cache are ignored.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Add a new entity directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Ignored if an entity with the same primary key is already in cache.
 *
 * @param entity - to add directly to cache.
 *
 * @param options - options such as mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: addOneToCache

docs.summary: Add a new entity directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Ignored if an entity with the same primary key is already in cache.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to cancel the persistence operation (query or save) with the given correlationId.
 *
 * @param correlationId - The correlation id for the corresponding EntityAction
 *
 * @param reason - explains why canceled and by whom.
 *
 * @param options - options such as the tag and mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: cancel

docs.summary: Dispatch action to cancel the persistence operation (query or save) with the given correlationId.

params.name: correlationId
params.description: The correlation id for the corresponding EntityAction

params.name: reason
params.description: explains why canceled and by whom.

params.name: options
params.description: options such as the tag and mergeStrategy

members.name: changeState$

docs.summary: Original entity values for entities with unsaved changes

members.name: clearCache

docs.summary: Clear the cached entity collection

members.name: collection$

docs.summary: Observable of the collection as a whole

members.name: count$

docs.summary: Observable of count of entities in the cached collection.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Create an {EntityAction} for this entity type and dispatch it immediately to the store.
 *
 * @param op - the entity operation
 *
 * @param data - the action data
 *
 * @param options - additional options
 *
 * @returns the dispatched EntityAction
 */
members.name: createAndDispatch

docs.summary: Create an {EntityAction} for this entity type and dispatch it immediately to the store.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Create an {EntityAction} for this entity type.
 *
 * @param op - the entity operation
 *
 * @param data - the action data
 *
 * @param options - additional options
 *
 * @returns the EntityAction
 */
members.name: createEntityAction

docs.summary: Create an {EntityAction} for this entity type.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.
 *
 * @param key - The entity to delete
 *
 * @param options - options that influence save and merge behavior
 *
 * @returns Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.
 */
members.name: delete

docs.summary: Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.
docs.returns: Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.

params.name: options
params.description: options that influence save and merge behavior

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.
 *
 * @param key - The primary key of the entity to remove
 *
 * @param options - options that influence save and merge behavior
 *
 * @returns Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.
 */
members.name: delete

docs.summary: Dispatch action to delete entity from remote storage by key.
docs.returns: Observable of the deleted key after server reports successful save or the save error.

params.name: key
params.description: The primary key of the entity to remove

params.name: options
params.description: options that influence save and merge behavior

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch an action of any type to the ngrx store.
 *
 * @param action - the Action
 *
 * @returns the dispatched Action
 */
members.name: dispatch

docs.summary: Dispatch an action of any type to the ngrx store.

members.name: dispatcher

docs.summary: Dispatcher of EntityCommands (EntityActions)

members.name: entities$

docs.summary: Observable of all entities in the cached collection.

members.name: entityActions$

docs.summary: Observable of actions related to this entity type.

members.name: entityMap$

docs.summary: Observable of the map of entity keys to entities

members.name: entityName

docs.summary: Name of the entity type of this collection service

members.name: errors$

docs.summary: Observable of error actions related to this entity type.

members.name: filter$

docs.summary: Observable of the filter pattern applied by the entity collection's filter function

members.name: filteredEntities$

docs.summary: Observable of entities in the cached collection that pass the filter function

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and merge the queried entities into the cached collection.
 *
 * @param options - options that influence merge behavior
 *
 * @returns Observable of the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.
 *
 * @see
 *
 * load()
 */
members.name: getAll

docs.summary: Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and merge the queried entities into the cached collection.
docs.returns: Observable of the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entity with this primary key. If the server returns an entity, merge it into the cached collection.
 *
 * @param key - The primary key of the entity to get.
 *
 * @param options - options that influence merge behavior
 *
 * @returns Observable of the queried entity that is in the collection after server reports success or the query error.
 */
members.name: getByKey

docs.summary: Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entity with this primary key. If the server returns an entity, merge it into the cached collection.
docs.returns: Observable of the queried entity that is in the collection after server reports success or the query error.

params.name: key
params.description: The primary key of the entity to get.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and merge the results into the cached collection.
 *
 * @param queryParams - the query in a form understood by the server
 *
 * @param options - options that influence merge behavior
 *
 * @returns Observable of the queried entities after server reports successful query or the query error.
 */
members.name: getWithQuery

docs.summary: Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and merge the results into the cached collection.
docs.returns: Observable of the queried entities after server reports successful query or the query error.

params.name: queryParams
params.description: the query in a form understood by the server

members.name: guard

docs.summary: Utility class with methods to validate EntityAction payloads.

members.name: keys$

docs.summary: Observable of the keys of the cached collection, in the collection's native sort order

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
 *
 * @param options - options that influence load behavior
 *
 * @returns Observable of the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.
 *
 * @see
 *
 * getAll
 */
members.name: load

docs.summary: Dispatch action to query remote storage for all entities and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
docs.returns: Observable of the collection after server reports successful query or the query error.

members.name: loaded$

docs.summary: Observable true when the collection has been loaded

members.name: loading$

docs.summary: Observable true when a multi-entity query command is in progress.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
 *
 * @param queryParams - the query in a form understood by the server
 *
 * @param options - options that influence load behavior
 *
 * @returns Observable of the queried entities after server reports successful query or the query error.
 */
members.name: loadWithQuery

docs.summary: Dispatch action to query remote storage for the entities that satisfy a query expressed with either a query parameter map or an HTTP URL query string, and completely replace the cached collection with the queried entities.
docs.returns: Observable of the queried entities after server reports successful query or the query error.

params.name: queryParams
params.description: the query in a form understood by the server

 * Remove multiple entities directly from the cache. Does not delete these entities from remote storage.
 *
 * @param entity - The entities to remove
 *
 * @param options - options such as mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: removeManyFromCache

docs.summary: Remove multiple entities directly from the cache. Does not delete these entities from remote storage.

 * Remove multiple entities directly from the cache. Does not delete these entities from remote storage.
 *
 * @param keys - The primary keys of the entities to remove
 *
 * @param options - options such as mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: removeManyFromCache

docs.summary: Remove multiple entities directly from the cache. Does not delete these entities from remote storage.

params.name: keys
params.description: The primary keys of the entities to remove

/**
 * Remove an entity directly from the cache. Does not delete that entity from remote storage.
 *
 * @param entity - The entity to remove
 *
 * @param options - options such as mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: removeOneFromCache

docs.summary: Remove an entity directly from the cache. Does not delete that entity from remote storage.

 * Remove an entity directly from the cache. Does not delete that entity from remote storage.
 *
 * @param key - The primary key of the entity to remove
 *
 * @param options - options such as mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: removeOneFromCache

docs.summary: Remove an entity directly from the cache. Does not delete that entity from remote storage.

params.description: The primary key of the entity to remove

docs.summary: Returns the primary key (id) of this entity

docs.summary: All selectors of entity collection properties

members.name: selectors$

docs.summary: All selectors$ (observables of entity collection properties)

docs.summary: Set the pattern that the collection's filter applies when using the `filteredEntities` selector.

members.name: setLoaded

docs.summary: Set the loaded flag

members.name: setLoading

docs.summary: Set the loading flag

members.name: store

docs.summary: The NgRx Store for the {EntityCache}

members.name: toUpdate

docs.summary: Convert an entity (or partial entity) into the `Update<T>` object `update...` and `upsert...` methods take `Update<T>` args

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to save the updated entity (or partial entity) in remote storage. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.
 *
 * @param entity - update entity, which might be a partial of T but must at least have its key.
 *
 * @param options - options that influence save and merge behavior
 *
 * @returns Observable of the updated entity after server reports successful save or the save error.
 */
members.name: update

docs.summary: Dispatch action to save the updated entity (or partial entity) in remote storage. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.
docs.returns: Observable of the updated entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

params.name: entity
params.description: update entity, which might be a partial of T but must at least have its key.

params.name: options
params.description: options that influence save and merge behavior

members.docComment:
/**
 * Update multiple cached entities directly. Does not update these entities in remote storage. Entities whose primary keys are not in cache are ignored. Update entities may be partial but must at least have their keys. such partial entities patch their cached counterparts.
 *
 * @param entities - to update directly in cache.
 *
 * @param options - options such as mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: updateManyInCache

docs.summary: Update multiple cached entities directly. Does not update these entities in remote storage. Entities whose primary keys are not in cache are ignored. Update entities may be partial but must at least have their keys. such partial entities patch their cached counterparts.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Update a cached entity directly. Does not update that entity in remote storage. Ignored if an entity with matching primary key is not in cache. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.
 *
 * @param entity - to update directly in cache.
 *
 * @param options - options such as mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: updateOneInCache

docs.summary: Update a cached entity directly. Does not update that entity in remote storage. Ignored if an entity with matching primary key is not in cache. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Dispatch action to save a new or existing entity to remote storage. Call only if the server supports upsert.
 *
 * @param entity - entity to add or upsert. It may omit its key if an add, and is pessimistic, and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.
 *
 * @param options - options that influence save and merge behavior
 *
 * @returns Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.
 */
members.name: upsert

docs.summary: Dispatch action to save a new or existing entity to remote storage. Call only if the server supports upsert.
docs.returns: Observable of the entity after server reports successful save or the save error.

params.name: entity
params.description: entity to add or upsert. It may omit its key if an add, and is pessimistic, and the server creates the key; must have a key if optimistic save.

params.name: options
params.description: options that influence save and merge behavior

members.docComment:
/**
 * Insert or update multiple cached entities directly. Does not save to remote storage. Upsert entities might be partial but must at least have their keys. Pass an array of the Update<T> structure as the payload.
 *
 * @param entities - to upsert directly in cache.
 *
 * @param options - options such as mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: upsertManyInCache

docs.summary: Insert or update multiple cached entities directly. Does not save to remote storage. Upsert entities might be partial but must at least have their keys. Pass an array of the Update<T> structure as the payload.

members.docComment:
/**
 * Insert or update a cached entity directly. Does not save to remote storage. Upsert entity might be a partial of T but must at least have its key. Pass the Update<T> structure as the payload.
 *
 * @param entity - to upsert directly in cache.
 *
 * @param options - options such as mergeStrategy
 */
members.name: upsertOneInCache

docs.summary: Insert or update a cached entity directly. Does not save to remote storage. Upsert entity might be a partial of T but must at least have its key. Pass the Update<T> structure as the payload.
Base class for a concrete EntityCollectionService<T>. Can be instantiated. Cannot be injected. Use EntityCollectionServiceFactory to create.

params.name: EntityCollectionServiceElements
params.description: The ingredients for this service as a source of supporting services for creating an EntityCollectionService<T> instance.
